sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Orkmont was once the seat of [[House Hoare]] when they were Kings of the Iron Islands. However when House Hoare went extinct during the [[War of Conquest]], the Targaryens allowed the ironborn to chose which of their Houses would rule over them under the Targaryens. [[House Greyjoy]] of [[Pyke (island)|Pyke]] was chosen, so the ruling seat of the Isles was transferred from Orkmont to Pyke.
